definition: public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)

sentences.english: I consent to take any pre-employment physical examination required by the Company.

sentences.english: It is selling watermelon juice in California and Oregon.
sentences.chinese: 该公司在加利福尼亚和俄勒冈州出售西瓜汁。

sentences.english: We also do import and export business in chemicals and agricultural products.
sentences.chinese: 我公司还经营化学产品和家产品进出口的业务。

sentences.english: Most of the global companies are moving manufacturing facilities out-side of Japan.
sentences.chinese: 大多数跨国公司都在把生产设备迁出日本。

sentences.english: The case was brought by Mercis Media, Bruna's copyright management firm.
sentences.chinese: 本案原告是米菲的版权拥有者Mercis传媒公司。

sentences.english: The bank granted a large loan to the company.
sentences.chinese: 银行贷给这家公司大量款项。

sentences.english: Another company I follow is Pediment Gold.
sentences.chinese: 另一家公司是山花我遵循黄金。

sentences.english: Have Chesapeake and other natural-gas producers survived the worst of the crisis?
sentences.chinese: 切萨皮克以及其他的天然气公司真的挺过来了吗？

sentences.english: No junketing activity would be conducted on official expenses without permission of the company.
sentences.chinese: 在未得到公司授权情况下，不得以公费进行宴请活动。

sentences.english: "The software company did not charge us too much, " says Feng.
sentences.chinese: “那家软件公司也没跟我们要很多钱，”冯说。

sentences.english: I also worked at an insurance company for my graduate field work.
sentences.chinese: 并且我在一家保险公司进行了我的毕业设计。

sentences.english: Virus-infected emails struck fear into the Microsoft Company.
sentences.chinese: 携带病毒的电子邮件引起了微软公司的恐慌。

sentences.english: Time Warner is parent company of AOL.
sentences.chinese: 时代华纳是美国在线的母公司。
